type.description: Artifact type. Examples include: component-version, container-image, fedora-dist-git, product, productmd-compose, redhat-container-group, redhat-container-image, rpm-build-group, rpm-build.

id.description: ID of the artifact. This is often the task ID from the build system, but in some cases, it will be a human readable pull request ID or the name-version-release in the case of a product artifact.

component.description: Name of the component tested. In certain cases, this ends up being the image's product name, or the name of the product of the group of containers being tested.

scratch.description: Indication if the build is a scratch build.

baseline.description: Name-version-release of baseline koji/brew build (for comparison). Only use in the case of rpm-build artifacts.

source.description: The first item in the request field from task details. This is usually a link to git repository with a reference, delimited with the '#' sign. In case of a scratch build or other build built via uploading a src.rpm, the build task source will look like the bash scratch build.

dependencies.description: NVR's of additional dependencies that were needed to install the koji/brew rpm build artifact. Note that usually to install a package, you might need to include packages not yet in production repositories.

comment_id.description: Comment number in the pull request.

uid.description: Pull request id unique across the whole Pagure instance.

repository.description: Name of the container image repository, URL of the tested repository, or URL of the repository with packages from the side-tag.

format.description: Format of the container image, for use with the container-image artifact only.

pull_ref.description: A pull-spec that can be used to pull the image, for use with the container-image artifact only.

full_name.description: Full name of the container image, in the form of 'registry:port/namespace/name:tag', for use with the redhat-container-image artifact only.

registry_url.description: Registry URL from the container image full name, for use with the redhat-container-image artifact only.

tag.description: Tag from the container image full name, for use with the redhat-container-image artifact only.

name.description: n from nvr of the product or name from the container image full name for artifacts of type product and redhat-container-image, respectively.

version.description: Version of the component tested or v from nvr of the product for artifacts of type component-version and product, respectively.

release.description: Release of the product, for use with the product artifact only.

digest.description: A digest that uniquely identifies the image within a repository.

architecture.description: Product architecture to test on, for use with the product artifact only.

phase.description: Product phase, for use with the product artifact only.

build.description: Product build, for use with the product artifact only.

state.description: Product ready state, for use with the product artifact only.

repos.description: Product preGA list of repos used for install, for use with the product artifact only.

compose_type.description: Type of compose produced by engineering, for use with the productmd-compose artifact only.

errata_id.description: ID of the associated advisory, for use with the redhat-container-group artifact only.

images.description: List of redhat-container-images in the group, for use with the redhat-container-group artifact only.

builds.description: List of the rpm-builds in the group, for use with the rpm-build-group artifact only.

artifacts.description: List of child artifacts, from which this product consists. It is required, but can be an empty list, for us with the product-build artifact only.
